post.description: Add a new Display Group to the CMS

put.description: Edit an existing Display Group identified by its Id

delete.description: Delete an existing Display Group identified by its Id

post.summary: Assign one or more Displays to a Display Group
post.description: Adds the provided Displays to the Display Group

parameters.name: displayGroupId
parameters.description: The Display Group to assign to

post.summary: Unassigns one or more Displays to a Display Group
post.description: Removes the provided Displays from the Display Group

parameters.name: displayGroupId
parameters.description: The Display Group to unassign from

post.summary: Assign one or more Media items to a Display Group
post.description: Adds the provided Media to the Display Group

parameters.name: displayGroupId
parameters.description: The Display Group to assign to

post.summary: Unassign one or more Media items from a Display Group
post.description: Removes the provided from the Display Group

parameters.name: displayGroupId
parameters.description: The Display Group to unassign from

post.summary: Set the Version for this Display
post.description: Sets the version instructions on all Displays in the Group

parameters.name: mediaId
parameters.description: The Media Id of the Installer File

post.description: Add a new Layout to the CMS

parameters.name: layoutId
parameters.description: If the Layout should be created with a Template, provide the ID, otherwise don't provide

parameters.name: resolutionId
parameters.description: If a Template is not provided, provide the resolutionId for this Layout.

parameters.name: DisplayGroupIds
parameters.description: The DisplayGroupIds to return the schedule for. Empty for All.

userId.description: The userId of the User that took this action

objectAfter.description: A JSON representation of the object after it was changed

userName.description: The User Name of the User that took this action

ownerId.description: The userId of the User that owns this Campaign

isLayoutSpecific.description: A 0|1 flag to indicate whether this is a Layout specific Campaign or not.

numberLayouts.description: The number of Layouts associated with this Campaign

userId.description: The userId of the User that owns this DataSet

lastDataEdit.description: Timestamp indicating the date/time this DataSet was edited last

owner.description: The user name of the User that owns this DataSet

groupsWithPermissions.description: A comma separated list of Groups/Users that have permission to this DataSet

dataSetId.description: The ID of the DataSet that this Column belongs to

dataTypeId.description: The ID of the DataType for this Column

dataSetColumnTypeId.description: The ID of the ColumnType for this Column

listContent.description: Comma separated list of valid content for drop down columns

columnOrder.description: The order this column should be displayed

formula.description: A MySQL formula for this column

dataType.description: The data type for this Column

dataSetColumnType.description: The column type for this Column

isAuditing.description: Flag indicating whether this Display is recording Auditing Information from XMDS

defaultLayoutId.description: The ID of the Default Layout

license.description: The Display Unique Identifier also called hardware key

licensed.description: A flag indicating whether this Display is licensed or not

loggedIn.description: A flag indicating whether this Display is currently logged in

lastAccessed.description: A timestamp in CMS time for the last time the Display accessed XMDS

incSchedule.description: A flag indicating whether the default layout is interleaved with the Schedule

emailAlert.description: A flag indicating whether the Display will send email alerts.

alertTimeout.description: A timeout in seconds for the Display to send email alerts.

clientAddress.description: The MAC Address of the Display

mediaInventoryStatus.description: The media inventory status of the Display

mediaInventoryXml.description: The last submitted Media Inventory XML from the Player

macAddress.description: The current Mac Address of the Player

lastChanged.description: A timestamp indicating the last time the Mac Address changed

numberOfMacAddressChanges.description: A count of Mac Address changes

lastWakeOnLanCommandSent.description: A timestamp indicating the last time a WOL command was sent

wakeOnLanEnabled.description: A flag indicating whether Wake On Lan is enabled

wakeOnLanTime.description: A h:i string indicating the time to send a WOL command

broadCastAddress.description: The broad cast address for this Display

secureOn.description: The secureOn WOL settings for this display.

cidr.description: The CIDR WOL settings for this display

versionInstructions.description: A JSON string representing the player installer that should be installed

clientType.description: A string representing the player type

clientVersion.description: A string representing the player version

clientCode.description: A number representing the Player version code

displayProfileId.description: The display settings profile ID for this Display

currentLayoutId.description: The current layout ID reported via XMDS

screenShotRequested.description: A flag indicating that a screen shot should be taken by the Player

storageAvailableSpace.description: The number of bytes of storage available on the device.

storageTotalSpace.description: The number of bytes of storage in total on the device

displayGroupId.description: The ID of the Display Group for this Device

displayGroups.description: The Display Groups this Display belongs to

isDisplaySpecific.description: A flag indicating whether this displayGroup is a single display displayGroup

displayProfileId.description: The ID of this Display Profile

name.description: The name of this Display Profile

type.description: The player type that this Display Profile is for

config.description: The configuration options for this Profile

isDefault.description: A flag indicating if this profile should be used as the Default for the client type

userId.description: The userId of the User that owns this profile

configDefault.description: The default configuration options for this Profile

configTabs.description: Array of tab names to logically group the configuration options

helpId.description: The ID of this Help Record

topic.description: The topic for this Help Record

category.description: The Category for this Help Record

link.description: The Link to the Manual for this Help Record

ownerId.description: The userId of the Layout Owner

campaignId.description: The id of the Layout's dedicated Campaign

backgroundImageId.description: The id of the image media set as the background

backgroundColor.description: A HEX string representing the Layout background color

createdDt.description: The datetime the Layout was created

modifiedDt.description: The datetime the Layout was last modified

retired.description: Flag indicating whether the Layout is retired

backgroundzIndex.description: The Layer that the background should occupy

runNo.description: A unique run number for a set of Log Messages.

logDate.description: A timestamp representing the CMS date this log message occured

channel.description: The Channel that generated this message. WEB/API/MAINT/TEST

displayId.description: The display ID this message relates to or NULL for CMS

display.description: The display this message relates to or CMS for CMS.

ownerId.description: The ID of the User that owns this Media

parentId.description: The Parent ID of this Media if it has been revised

mediaType.description: The module type of this Media

storedAs.description: The file name of the media as stored in the library

fileName.description: The original file name as it was uploaded

duration.description: The duration to use when assigning this media to a Layout widget

valid.description: Flag indicating whether this media is valid.

moduleSystemFile.description: Flag indicating whether this media is a system file or not

expires.description: Timestamp indicating when this media should expire

retired.description: Flag indicating whether this media is retired

isEdited.description: Flag indicating whether this media has been edited and replaced with a newer file

md5.description: A MD5 checksum of the stored media file

owner.description: The username of the User that owns this media

groupsWithPermissions.description: A comma separated list of groups/users with permissions to this Media

validExtensions.description: A comma separated list of Valid Extensions

imageUri.description: The file uri of an image to represent this Module

type.description: The type code for this module

enabled.description: A flag indicating whether this module is enabled

regionSpecific.description: A flag indicating whether this module is specific to a Layout or can be uploaded to the Library

previewEnabled.description: A flag indicating whether the Layout designer should render a preview of this module

assignable.description: A flag indicating whether the module is assignable to a Layout

renderAs.description: A flag indicating whether the module should be rendered natively by the Player or via the CMS (native|html)

settings.description: An array of additional module specific settings

schemaVersion.description: The schema version of the module

viewPath.description: The Twig View path for module specific templates

page.description: A code name for the page

permissionId.description: The ID of this Permission Record

entityId.description: The Entity ID that this Permission refers to

groupId.description: The User Group ID that this permission refers to

objectId.description: The object ID that this permission refers to

isUser.description: A flag indicating whether the groupId refers to a user specific group

entity.description: The entity name that this refers to

objectIdString.description: Legacy for when the Object ID is a string

group.description: The group name that this refers to

view.description: A flag indicating whether view permission is granted

edit.description: A flag indicating whether edit permission is granted

delete.description: A flag indicating whether delete permission is granted

modifyPermissions.description: A flag indicating whether modify permission permission is granted.

ownerId.description: The userId of the User that owns this Playlist

regions.description: An array of Regions this Playlist is assigned to

widgets.description: An array of Widgets assigned to this Playlist

displayOrder.description: The display order of the Playlist when assigned to a Region

layoutId.description: The Layout ID this region belongs to

ownerId.description: The userId of the User that owns this Region

top.description: The top coordinate of the Region

left.description: The left coordinate of the Region

zIndex.description: The z-index of the Region to control Layering

displayOrder.description: When linked from a Playlist, what is the display order of that link

regionId.description: The regionId that this Option applies to

width.description: The display width of the resolution

height.description: The display height of the resolution

designerWidth.description: The designer width of the resolution

designerHeight.description: The designer height of the resolution

enabled.description: A flag indicating whether this resolution is enabled or not

campaignId.description: The CampaignID this event is for

displayGroups.description: Display Groups assigned to this Scheduled Event.

userId.description: The userId that owns this event.

fromDt.description: A Unix timestamp representing the from date of this event in CMS time.

toDt.description: A Unix timestamp representing the to date of this event in CMS time.

isPriority.description: Flag indicating whether the event should be considered priority or not.

displayOrder.description: The display order for this event.

recurrenceType.description: If this event recurs when what is the recurrence period.

recurrenceDetail.description: If this event recurs when what is the recurrence frequency.

recurrenceRange.description: A Unix timestamp indicating the end time of the recurring events.

layoutIds.description: An array of layoutIDs with this Tag

mediaIds.description: An array of mediaIds with this Tag

hasDirection.description: Flag indicating whether this is a directional transition

hasDuration.description: Flag indicating whether this transition has a duration option

availableAsIn.description: Flag indicating whether this transition should be available for IN assignments

availableAsOut.description: Flag indicating whether this transition should be available for OUT assignments

loggedIn.description: Flag indicating whether this user is logged in or not

email.description: Email address of the user used for email alerts

homePageId.description: The pageId of the Homepage for this User

lastAccessed.description: A timestamp indicating the time the user last logged into the CMS

newUserWizard.description: A flag indicating whether this user has see the new user wizard

retired.description: A flag indicating whether the user is retired

libraryQuota.description: The users library quota in bytes

groups.description: An array of user groups this user is assigned to

campaigns.description: An array of Campaigns for this User

layouts.description: An array of Layouts for this User

media.description: An array of Media for this user

events.description: An array of Scheduled Events for this User

isUserSpecific.description: A flag indicating whether this is a user specific group or not

isEveryone.description: A flag indicating the special everyone group

libraryQuota.description: This users library quota in bytes. 0 = unlimited

playlistId.description: The ID of the Playlist this Widget belongs to

ownerId.description: The ID of the User that owns this Widget

duration.description: The duration in seconds this widget should be shown

displayOrder.description: The display order of this widget

mediaIds.description: An array of MediaIds this widget is linked to

permissions.description: An array of permissions for this widget

module.description: The Module Object for this Widget

widgetId.description: The Widget ID that this Option belongs to

type.description: The option type, either attrib or raw
